website_summaries.verdict: A creamy, twist-up eyeliner with a bonus sharpener that's easy to apply and gentle enough for sensitive individuals as well as contact lens wearers.
pros: A mechanical eyeliner that's made with skin-conditioning olive oil and shea butter that give it a smooth texture
Colors have light diffusing properties that provide an eye-brightening effect
Has both a built-in smudger and sharpener
cons: Tip breaks easily, and requires frequent sharpening – but fortunately the built-in sharpener is there when you need it
Mixed opinions on how well it stays put

customer_reviews.title: Really lives up to that hypoallergenic promise
customer_reviews.text: A really excellent eyeliner for blondes. My eyes get very watery and red when I put on eyeliner of almost any kind, even eyeliners that claim to be hypoallergenic--for a while I feared I would no longer be able to wear eyeliner every again--but I gave this one a last-ditch try a while back, and I'm so glad I did. This brand and type is the only one that doesn't irritate my lids and eyes and undereye skin. I would recommend this eyeliner to anyone who struggles with sensitivity to eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Elvy

customer_reviews.title: ... rub off in my waterline or end up looking like a raccoon
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner I have found that stays put and doesn't rub off in my waterline or end up looking like a raccoon. I've been using it for years and will not use another eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so it's easy to apply and also gives a nice "soft" look ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft, so it's easy to apply and also gives a nice "soft" look rather than the sharp outline of a liquid liner. Here's a totally unsolicited tip from me to other women with a fair complexion and light colored eyes: stop trying to achieve the "smoky eye" look. It doesn't work for people of our coloring! This will give you a nice, better-than-natural look instead looking like "The Hamburglar's" sister.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner for sensitive eyes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my order today, and played with it... - Goes on smoothly, I'm not going over and over like with eyeliner pens (Less chances of eye poking) - Soft, doesn't scratch my waterline, doesn't burn, or make me cry. - It has been on for at least 15 min, and my eyes don't feel itchy, irritated, or dry. - Because it is soft, don't expect OCD crisp lines. I'm personally planning on using this around the waterline, and different ones for accents. I will definitely buy more colors in the future. :) 20yrs of being told I'd get use to makeup and not tear up, and I finally find something that doesn't feel like torture. <3
customer_reviews.author: Taelune

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner for sensitive eyes and/or contact wearers.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Super soft (not crumbly) and gentle, it glides on smoothly, blends easily, great pigment, looks great, and lasts all day...at least on me, top lid. It's also easy to remove and doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole C

customer_reviews.title: Does not smudge!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I found an eyeliner that doesn't smudge! Great stuff! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Yuyuen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner. WAY better than MAC
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner. WAY better than MAC, Nars, and Urban Decay products I have tried. Stays on all day, even through workouts. Very easy to apply and does not smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Farrington

customer_reviews.title: BEST EYELINER. GREAT PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best eyeliner hands down. I’ve used this for about 4 years now and it just never fails. It’s very smooth, easy to apply and lasts all day. Sad it isn’t at Target anymore but hope they don’t remove it from Amazon! Love it! I use the Spice Chocolate color and it looks great with my hazel eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DON"T DISCONTINUE
customer_reviews.text: I went without eyeliner for months when it discontinued in stores. I ordered 4 from here just to stock up to be on the safe side.. still hard to find and purchase. My eyes are sensitive and this is all my eyes can tolerate. Creamy, soft, beautiful, and no irritation. I bought the new version that came out and it was horrible for me just like all those other eyeliners out there. You have a great product DON'T DISCONTINUE IT PLEASE. I don't know what crazy ingredient is causing this sensitivity, but this eyeliner doesn't have it. I need to investigate this lol, sigh...
customer_reviews.author: DJ.KZ

customer_reviews.title: Only eyeliner I’ve used since middle school!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a longtime fan of this eyeliner. I have shaky hands and just could never perfect the art of liquid liner. The pencil eyeliner is ideal for me because I can create a thickened lash line look without creating a black, smudged mess all over my face. It’s a soft eyeliner look so do not expect a bold wing with this liner! Comes off easy with water and soap. NOT waterproof. Have used this product for years and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to keep sharp
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is wonderfully easy to put on, stays put for a long, long time - but if you need to sharpen it, good luck to you. It comes with a little sharpener embedded in the tip underneath the smudger, but I find it impossible to actually get the tip sharpened. Every time I try, I end up with the eyeliner broken off (or rather, "smeared off") inside the sharpener, no matter how slow and careful I am. So basically, the eyeliner is now useless, unless I want a thick imprecise line. For the price, I expected something better.
customer_reviews.author: Ricarda F.

customer_reviews.title: This isn't what you want.
customer_reviews.text: This would have been wonderful . It's a nice color, and a decent texture. But once the pencil is long enough to be applied, the "lead" breaks off in chunks. I've used it three times, which went the same way. It demonstrates that the bad results are consistent, and that I'm a slow learner. So go buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: alison julian

customer_reviews.title: Still the best stick eyeliner I've used in years
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. I'm not huge on wearing makeup everyday all day, but I use it for business and going out and more every year it seems. This was one of the ones i tried early on in life. After so many other brands I've still always preferred this one. It glides on smooth. It's easy to keep a sharp line when you need it compared to sharpening pencils. It has good pigment in all the colors (I have a few different ones). And if you're into smudging for the smokey effect, it has one of those on the back too.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Has been my go-to eyeliner for years. One of the best, if not the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one that doesnt smudge and looks great. Ive used high end expensive eyeliners as well ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this eyeliner since highschool. Only one that doesnt smudge and looks great. Ive used high end expensive eyeliners as well and they just dont do it the same as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole St Clair

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting eye liner I have found to date
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive eyes and need eyeliner that doesn't make my eyes itch or get weepy. I want something that would last all day. I finally found it. I only use the liner under my eye on the waterline, and so I tried it the first time without any powder to see how it would perform on it's own. It lasted for almost 8 hours looking the same as when I applied. So I tried again with a little powder to set it and it stayed all day. No drooling in the corners at all after a few hours. Super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's true! Goes on easy, doesn't run, lasts all-day, and is easy to remove!
customer_reviews.text: The 5-star reviews are right--I was skeptical because I've never had an eyeliner that didn't run leading to the dreaded "racoon eyes"--but it is true! Neutrogena's Nourishing Eyeliner Pencil is amazing! I am fascinated how easily it goes on and yet stays put once it "sets," which is not immediate so you can still smear or correct it easily with the built in smudger/blender. I wish I had discovered this product sooner because Neutrogena is discontinuing it. NEUTROGENA, PLEASE DO NOT DISCONTINUE THIS BELOVED EYELINER!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Stayed in place
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this eyeliner more than 5 stars, I totally would. I put it on in the morning, went to an event, came home to nap and it was STILL in place. I’ve never had makeup stay on after a nap! I’ve already told numerous people. Get the eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: JenMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed with the texture.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color and the twist up feature as well as the self sharpener. Unfortunately, it was not at all a smooth application. I had to go over several times to get the full color and then I had to sponge off the uneven line. I am an old lady now with wrinkles but this was harder to apply than my other off brands.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Howard

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this online
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found these on Amazon; they used to be in the pharmacy I often go to, and they have stopped stocking them. This brand is a nice colour for me (brushed pewter), soft, but not wimpy. The colour stays for the whole day, and I have no trouble removing it at night. Please keep stocking these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer in Raleigh, NC

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. After years of having watery eyes when I use eyeliner, this is awesome and I am so glad I found it. Doesn't make my eyes water or burn and stays on like advertised
customer_reviews.author: SMcD

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this eyeliner. I have pretty sensitive eyes & this doesn't cause irritation. It doesn't make a mess on my face either which is a huge plus lol
customer_reviews.author: texascutie

customer_reviews.title: The only one that doesn't irritate my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. It's one of the very few eyeliners I could find that dont make my eyes burn and itch. It is also very soft and easy to apply . It does smudge fast but I guess it is what it is since at least it doesnt irritate my eyes like all the other eye liners Dom
customer_reviews.author: Lana S

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! So much cheaper than in stores and seems to be authentic!!! This is hands down my favorite eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Battle

customer_reviews.title: Used to be my favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is discontinued in stores which was disappointing since it was my favorite. Since I could not find it anymore I was happy to be able to order it online. I ordered 5 of these to help hold me over until I could find another eyeliner I liked as much. I am not sure if these are from a bad batch but I have never had this eyeliner smudge as much as these have. I have opened 3 different ones and they all do it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Such a necessity!!!
customer_reviews.text: Soo I’ve been wearing this specific liner for YEARS now. Target and Walmart discontinued them in stores and I lost it!! This is the only liner (tried MAC, Clinique, other Neutrogena liners, etc.) that doesn’t leave me with leaking and swollen eyes. I’m SO happy they are back for sale online. I’m officially stocked!!! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive dry eyes!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been diagnosed with dry eye syndrome and have tried all the top of the line eyeliners....This eyeliner is truly the only one that not only feels comfortable but doesn’t seem to smudge during the day and even during my work outs!! I mostly use it on my waterline and a bit at the corners of my eye. It seems like the Cosmic Black color is discontinued but thankfully I have stocked up! I haven’t tried the other available colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One perfect eye liner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eye liner! Great colors, goes on smoothly, which doesn’t always happen with other brands. And I love the built in sharpener & smudger tip on the end. One perfect eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance free and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: my favorite liner, does not cause any irritation, fragrance free, applied smooth and long lasting! I wish there are more colors, including jet black!
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Real Product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is the real deal. I will be buying this again . I can’t tell you how long it lasts but I use it to draw my cat eye and do my liquid over it because if you make a mistake you can easily wipe it off .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wears off quickly
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner goes on very easily and the built in sharpener and smudger are great. However, this eyeliner does not last and an hour after application it has mostly worn off. Next time I'm going to try another product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Nice eyeliner! This liner goes on better than most brands. I live in a very humid climate and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect for an older woman with short, light eyelashes. I don't always have to use mascara because the liner works so well. The color is not harsh. It looks beautiful with blue eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Stays put
customer_reviews.text: Stays put and does not smudge! Great value as well. I have major trouble with eyeliners rubbing off onto to the skin below my eyebrows when I blink, but this doesn't. Also, it is soft and applies smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the color?
customer_reviews.text: I like the Neutrogena brand but all products are not created equal. I purchased twilight blue. The color was extremely faint. After applying multiple coats, it looked more like I was taking it off than putting it on. I could barely see it. I gave up and used another brand. I’ve never used Neutrogena eyeliner so I don’t know if this is normal. I would expect flat color with lighter shades but not with navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The best ever liner
customer_reviews.text: Soft, so no pulling on eyelid; small tip, so you can do a skinny line or smudge it; self sharpening. Best for the money and convenient drugstore purchase. (Although I always shop with Amazon Prime if I can).
customer_reviews.author: JudyG

customer_reviews.title: Dark blue is not very blue
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, soft, I like it. Im just disappointed the dark blue is not very blue at all, shows up more like very dark grey or even black, unless you put a lot of it on. I was hoping for a more subtle blue look and you can't get it with this. However, if you're disappointed that they don't have a black color and you don't mind the tiniest hint of blue, just get the dark blue!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: SENSITIVE EYES DREAM LINER!!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this liner been my entire life???? I have the world's most sensitive eyes and this is the only liner I've ever worn ( I have literally tried dozens-high end to low) that caused absolutely no redness, watering, burning, NOTHING!!! It lasts forever too with a little transfer only. Easy to apply, no tugging and pigmented to perfection!!! Lifetime user here.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I usually really like this product, so I was disappointed when I used this! It did not apply as easily! Had to use a lot of pressure, it definitely did not "glide on". And my eyes watered at itched like crazy until I removed it. Will not be purchasing again. Did they change the formula?!
customer_reviews.author: ~michelle~

customer_reviews.title: Great soft eyeliner for protecting eyelids
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for quite a while. When I couldn't find it at the local store anymore, I ordered it from Amazon. It's a great product that doesn't pull or tug at the tender skin above the eyelashes. It makes me feel better knowing that I'm not pulling on that tender skin, and hopefully reducing wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor.
customer_reviews.text: Has a really strong odor, does stay on a long time. The top of the package was opened so wonder if mine was old or a return? Have mixed feelings about using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T

customer_reviews.title: Better for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: Great for my super extremely sensitive eyes. i still notice some irritation when putting on but I normally get terrible migraines 30 minutes into wearing eyeliner makeup. I was able to last a while day with this and no migraine just slight eye irritation where they get watery. This is a big improvement from the swollen eyes I normally get with any eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: NicsDesign

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this cause it’s defective waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this online cause it’s very cheap instead of going to the store. When I got it it looks okay like in the store. But when I opened it and started using it, it started breaking off and by the time I know it. Almost all of it are gone. I bought two and the same thing happened to the second one. Didn’t get to use it and breaks off and the sharpener doesn’t work either. Waste of my money. I will buy this in target, Walgreens and Walmart next time. Even if I pay a little more at least I get to use all of it and the pencil works.
customer_reviews.author: myra mercado alejo

customer_reviews.title: Good product for good price.
customer_reviews.text: The local stores don't sell this anymore so I order several at a time online. It goes on smooth, and doesnt dry out my eyes like other eyeliner. Good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this eyeliner 10 plus years. Still my fav even after trying high end. 💙
customer_reviews.author: Chad&Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Supplier for my eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this eyeliner for the price! I use this product and it's much more expensive.at Wal-Mart! And fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: DEnise

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite eyeliner! I love the brushed pewter color - ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner! I love the brushed pewter color - it's perfect and easy to use. Only problem with this is that the tip breaks easily. I have this same product in black I bought a few years ago, and this never happened. Not sure if this is a fluke, but it's annoying. Other than that though, I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: I’m pleased with it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! I have oily skin but the eyeliner seems to stay on just fine. The only problem is that I run out of it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Emuh

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fave eyeliner. It worsks so well.. All others have smeared and such on me...and they irritate my eyes. this one is so nice and doesnt irritate at all. This color..black..is hardly ever in stock in stores around me...so when i found it here and saw that its 2 bucks cheaper i was ecstatic! I always buy it from amazon now.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: It’s slim, super easy to use and applies very nicely. Whether you use dark line or choose to smudge with applicator, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim G

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. It stays put; I love the subtle shimmer. Color is perfect to enhance my eyes. In extreme heat/ humidity, it can transfer to my upper lids if they get oily. Will use a primer on those occasions.
customer_reviews.author: tea lover

customer_reviews.title: long lasting for 12 hours
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner I have had so far. over the years I have tried all brands expensive and cheap nothing lasted on my eyes for more than couple of hours due to allergies but this Neutrogena eyeliner I got just a week ago and I could not believe lasts me all day more than 12 hours. I give 10 stars for this product. I wish they had more colors I would buy them all!! Kudos to the company. I will be buying this product often as I wear it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Eyeliners ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried MANY other hypo-allergenic eyeliner brands and they ALL irritated my eyes, causing burning. Neutrogena eyeliners are THE BEST--- they don't irritate my eyes and are so well-designed, with a smudge tip and built-in sharpener at the end. Genius!
customer_reviews.author: 15Watts

customer_reviews.title: Messy but very hypoallergenic.
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was getting since I used this in high school but incase you didn't know it applies sloppy and comes off easily. It does come with a built in sharpener and applies nice and dark. Perfect for smoky eye but not smooth lines. Great for sensitive eyes. It's the only eyeliner that doesn't give me a rash.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Does not smear!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite drugstore eyeliner and after going to the store and it not being in stock I resorted to Amazon! It’s actually cheaper on Amazon than in store so that was a double bonus! This eyeliner does not smear on my eyes after all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: ButlerFam

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is the best I’ve used. It glides on very nicely and smoothly for my 70 year old eyelids! My only complaint is it runs out quicker than others I’ve used (and I don’t use all that much, or any at all during these pandemic stay at home times). This leads me to believe it’s not as “long” as the housing of the pencil. But I still love it and will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Goes on super easy but is very hard to take off
customer_reviews.text: Goes on super easy but is very hard to take off! Also, just a bit lighter than I expected. I wouldn’t say it irritates my eyes but I don’t find it to be super sensitive either. Still a good product
customer_reviews.author: Pat Logan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because my eyes are very sensitive and it was fine to wear this.
customer_reviews.author: Chzy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's good overall Better than what ive used in the past. You still will get raccoon eyes but not as bad and not as fast. It's been the best so far. Ill continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: VTGant

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't tug at your eyelids... That's always a plus.
customer_reviews.text: My current favorite eyeliner. Sensitive skin here, super dry too. It glides on and stays put. No sharpening needed, travels well and doesn't melt in a hot car. I like the dark blue color as well. Been using this for a couple of years now. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K433Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A lot of plastic, fir a little eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few eyeliners that does not make my eyes leak uncontrollably. The cruddy thing is, there is about an inch & a half of actual eyeliner. I go through one in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth, but wears off
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smoothly, but wears off halfway through the day
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Ok - but wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I was in a pinch for a new eyeliner. This was ok. The price was just right but didn’t love the way that it goes on. Seems a little streaky. I did like that it came with a sharpener, because so many don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Burr

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ❤️ truly nourishing!
customer_reviews.text: BEST eyeliner I’ve ever used!!! So soft, not dry, the color isn’t harsh, I wear it daily. Because it’s a lighter consistency I really do feel like it’s better for my lashes. LOVE ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Good color. Moist and easy to apply. As good as origins.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn's Missives

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last on me
customer_reviews.text: Was really hoping for a not too dark gray that stayed on my lids all day but no suck luck for me. By early afternoon it’s on my eyelids and hardly visible around my lash line. Had great reviews which is why I purchased but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I really like it, however
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, however, it's not longwear at all. I have to apply a few times a day during my shift. It smudges a bit too.
customer_reviews.author: LaTanyaL

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Apply's smoothly, stays put all day. Removes easily with make-up remover or baby wipe. Very affordable. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Give this a try!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, yes you can smudge, I like the sharpening when needed and that it has a plastic case surrounding the tip so it does not break,
customer_reviews.author: Dobie

customer_reviews.title: No allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Many eyeliners give me a dry skin issue on my lids. Tgis is the only one that doesn't. Easy to remove with neutrogena makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Revi3wer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I rarely buy makeup online but the price was too good to pass up! I'm pleasantly surprised! Glides on very smoothly and removes easily with minimal pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I’m 63 and hate try to apply eyeliner, mainly because as you age the eye tissue is softer and my skin is no longer tight. This liner works really well, easy to apply and I can do a fine line or thick. Smooth application. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner out there
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best eyeliner I have ever used. Super easy application and very soft application. Helluva price compared to drug stores. Neutrogena is tried and true to be safe for sensitive skin like my own.
customer_reviews.author: Island Life

customer_reviews.title: dries out quickly & useless smudging end
customer_reviews.text: It's great at first, but dries out after about 8 weeks, making it impossible to apply. The smudging end is hard plastic and doesn't do much but tug your eyelid around. CoverGirl Perfect Point Plus or Clinique Quickliner are better alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this style of Neutrogena eyeliner for years! So happy to find it on Amazon at a good price. It’s the only brand/style that works with my sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Hard and dry It should last a long time since I can’t see anything on my eyes unless I spend a lot of time and repetition with pressure before I begin to see something
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Nice liner stick
customer_reviews.text: This goes on smoothly and stays on all day. It has a slight gold shimmer to it. There is a tip sharpener and a smudger. I searched for a long time to find something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to apply and very forgiving if you mess up the line. It's nice for aging eyes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this before and liked it. I only use it on my lower lash line and its pretty good. Doest go on all that dark though.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the only affordable eyeliner that does not smudge on contacts
customer_reviews.author: MommyJaime027

customer_reviews.title: Easiest eyeliner to put on!
customer_reviews.text: Great pencil eyeliner that glides on, stays on & easy to remove. Love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Easy application and lasts
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this eyeliner for years and it always glides on easily and is easy to smudge just as much as I want it too. It lasts for hours and then cleans up quickly with a wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Worked great first few times then tip broke off and its still not working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Naegele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The drugstore is not carrying it anymore, so I need to order online now!
customer_reviews.author: L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: availability
customer_reviews.text: Have used this eyeliner for years and it's so easy to order at Amazon. Color doesn't run
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Buker

customer_reviews.title: nice color
customer_reviews.text: I like this eyeliner, however, I have to go over it with a matching eyeshadow to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Konradt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner doesn't go on evenly and is hard to use the smudge end. It ends up smearing under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: KC AZ

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this eye liner! It never breaks off like others I have used. Also very smooth application!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Eye love it!
customer_reviews.text: Already knew what I wanted but didn’t want to go to store. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get everything I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for four and only got three. The box has holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: PRM

customer_reviews.title: Deep black, impressive
customer_reviews.text: I ‘ve just used it for under eye line. It has deep color, soft & easy to apply. 1 of my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Apply and Fades Fast
customer_reviews.text: Does not glide on easily or stay on. I consider myself an eyeliner pro and I would not buy this again. I wear eyeliner on the top and bottom lid and it doesn’t work for either. I don’t understand why they make eyeliner that’s so hard to apply..
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: best product
customer_reviews.text: best liner on market tried a lot of brands I love this one
customer_reviews.author: DIANA MALLAYEVA

customer_reviews.title: easy application
customer_reviews.text: and very natural looking. The blender at the other end works well.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Great discontinued eye liner
customer_reviews.text: I use this all time. I think it is discontinued so I buy it online.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C. Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying  -
customer_reviews.text: The pencil tip broke after trying to apply the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Feels over priced for the actual amount of make up that comes inside
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great but the actual amount of product is like half the size of the entire liner-pencil. I like the brand and the product but I would not buy again for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Itzel Meza

customer_reviews.title: So-so quality, not dark enough, fades after several hours
customer_reviews.text: I used this eyeliner when I started out with makeup -- before I realized that I preferred the darker black eyeliners out there with longer staying power, and that don't smear. The good thing about this eyeliner is the crayon twist and the decently smooth application, but for a lower price per ounce, I'd go with Urban Decay's Perversion 24/7 Eye Pencil.
customer_reviews.author: e.e.

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner Review
customer_reviews.text: Did not find the pencil unusually good as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: A Mother's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother, who said it couldn't arrive soon enough! She loves this particular eyeliner and shade, uses it every day, and said she's going to order it in bulk next time to stock up; so, I guess that shows just how much she loves it! I deducted a star because it arrived late, but my mother was more than happy to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl of the Dark Age

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Nourishing Eyeliner Pencil, Built-in Sharpener for Precise Application and Smudger for Soft Smokey Look, Luminous, Nonfading and Nonsmudging Cosmic Black 10,.01 oz
product_meta.description:
Color:10 / Cosmic BlackHelp define and brighten your eyes with the Neutrogena Nourishing Eyeliner Makeup Pencil. Rich, luminous and long-lasting color glides on smoothly to enhance eyes all day without smudging or fading. Subtle light diffusers within the eyeliner pencil make whites of eyes appear whiter, while olive oil and rainforest shea butter add nourishment. The built-in sharpener allows for precise application and definition, and the contoured smudger helps you achieve a soft, blended, smoky-eye look. The dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested eye makeup formula is gentle and safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. This nourishing eyeliner comes in several beautiful shades and can be complemented by any Neutrogena Mascara or easily removed with the Neutrogena Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover.

BRAND STORY
By Neutrogena Cosmetics
feature_bullets: .01-ounce pencil of Neutrogena Nourishing Eyeliner Makeup to help define and enhance the look of your eyes with rich, luminous and long-lasting color

Formulated with nourishing olive oil and rainforest shea butter, it glides on smoothly and lasts all day without fading or smudging. Subtle light diffusers within the eyeliner pencil also help make the whites of eyes appear whiter
The pencil includes a built-in sharpener for precision makeup application and definition as well as a contoured smudger to help achieve a soft, blended, smoky eye look
The dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested eye makeup formula is gentle and safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers
This nourishing eyeliner comes in several beautiful shades and can be complemented by any Neutrogena Mascara or easily removed with the Neutrogena Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover
